embeddedItem.name: Healing Spray
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, immediately heals a single ally by <nobr>38%</nobr> of their Max HP plus <nobr>400</nobr> extra HP.
embeddedItem.lore:
A common medicine used by adventurers to quickly seal wounds with adhesive foam.

"In the past, all medical breakthroughs were made with the sweat and blood of the pioneers in this field. Now, with the help of Healing Spray, only sweat is needed!"

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

273339.name: Recipe: Healing Spray
273339.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.

440416.name: Solid Water
440416.lore:
Compound composed of hydrogen and oxygen, essential to support carbon-based life.
Keeping it in the solid state makes it easy to carry.

"...Isn't it ice?"
"No, no, no. Ice is ice, this is water, just in the solid state."
"...Isn't that the definition of ice?"
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Baryons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

757713.name: Ambergris of Abundance
757713.lore:
Jelly-like substance that contains the power of Abundance.
Firm but not stiff, with notes of fragrance, it fills your heart with hope the moment it touches your fingertip.
Do not ask what it's made of.

"It gives you longevity and abundance, dispelling misfortune and illness."
comeFrom: Cloudford: Mara-Struck Soldiers or other enemies
